The Sights & Culture Package at The Raviz Kovalam, India’s only clifftop beach resort is sure to transport you into a realm that is totally out of this world! Book your holiday with us right away to experience a blissful stay and the heartiest of sights!

More details at http://bit.ly/39EeFsM

For bookings contact: +91 471 305 1234 | 1800 4252 2220
mail: reservations.kovalam@theraviz.com | reservations@theraviz.com
